## EntityModelAnimation.pause() method

Pauses the entity model animation, does nothing if already paused.

\*\*Side effects:\*\* Emits `EntityModelAnimationEvent.PAUSE` when spawned.

\*\*Category:\*\* Entities

**Signature:**

```typescript
pause(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void
